docs.title: Documentation for internal methods
docs.text:
# Base.size — Method.

Base.size(sg::SpatialGraph)

Returns the number of nodes in a spatial graph sg.

source

# MetacommunityDynamics._env_from_layer — Method.

_env_from_layer(coords, layer::EnvironmentLayer)

Returns the values in the layer at the given coordinates, given the bounding-box os the coordinates is the extent of the layer.

source

# MetacommunityDynamics.distance_matrix — Method.

distance_matrix(sg::SpatialGraph; distance = Euclidean())

Returns a matrix of pairwise distances for all nodes in a SpatialGraph

source

docs.title: Public methods
docs.text:
# MetacommunityDynamics.envdims — Method.

envdims(sg::SpatialGraph)

Returns the dimensionality of the environmental variable associated with each node in a SpatialGraph sg.

source

# MetacommunityDynamics.environment — Method.

environment(sg::SpatialGraph)

Returns the matrix of environmental variables of a SpatialGraph sg

source

# MetacommunityDynamics.numsites — Method.

numsites(sg::SpatialGraph)

Returns the number of nodes in a SpatialGraph sg.

source
